name: J Tytanic
text: The pizza was amazing! I love the different styles. The only complaint I have is punctuality. I scheduled for pickup about 6 hours in advance. My order was still late and there was only one man waiting, appearing that they were not busy. I â€¦More

name: sapno ki
text: Pizza was really good. I went there with 100 dollar bill. My car was too far to walk and they didn't have change for 100. The manger of the day was so nice to give me two medium pizzas for free. Customer service was great and welcoming employees.

name: Kristie Locke
text: Love this place! Shocked at the bad reviews because we tried it and it was amazing!! We live kinda far and we make the drive for the buffalo Mac and cheese pizza because it's so good!!!! BTW the staff are awesome! I've recommend to several friends and we've used Toppers for 2 birthday parties... So far ðŸ˜Š

name: Marissa King
text: Called and ordered 6 large pizzas for a delivery around 7 pm. I waited about an hour, after being told it would be a two hour wait, and they delivered! Super exciting and the food was stellar! Will definitely be ordering more often.

name: Josh L
text: Seriously though, toppers in Fishers kicks more ass than a Tom Brady/ Peyton Manning love child. The crazy pizza combos, all the sauces, the Mac n cheese..... It's a fat guys dream and a skinny girls special cheat day. The prices are â€¦More

name: Brandon Milster
text: I read the reviews and thought I would still give it a try.  It was customer appreciation week, so I wanted to give it a shot.  Had a good deal for buy one get one on pizza and cheese stix, so I tried to order online.  Online was down, so I â€¦More

name: Marissa Gilman
text: Would have given more stars if the "expected" delivery time was more accurate. Got a confirmation stating 6:02p and the pizza didn't arrive until after 6:40p. We called at 6:15 and were told the driver had just left 5 minutes ago and we â€¦More

name: Caleb Claypool
text: I'd call this home of your favorite food dreams.  BBQ Chicken pizza with Mac and cheese between crust and cheese? no problem.  Tater tots and nacho cheese on your pizza? Done. â€¦More

name: Philip Bader
text: Literally every employee in this store was stoned, without exception.  Pizza was pretty good though.  Minus a star because the guy behind the register was pretty rude but, as I said, he was clearly high as a kite and my order was correct.

name: David Pedersen
text: Food quality has gone way downhill.  Last 2 delivery orders took well over an hour when the estimated delivery time was 35 min.  Asked driver what was going on and was told management is a mess.  Too bad.  This used to be much better so I believe it must be a management issue.

name: Jennifer Kikta
text: Our go to pizza place. So close to our house. They are very quick. Only 4 stars because at times the pizza is cold (even when picked up on time). the Nacho cheese could be warmed up - its served cold.

name: Jackson Ridgeway
text: Toppers pizza is the best no matter what location I go to its always fast and super hot you guys are the best keep up the good work

name: Katrina T
text: Great staff. They were having a conversation about how cute corgis are and I have to say, I agreed. Pizza is always awesome.

name: Jeremy R Huffman
text: Pretty good pizza for the price but long wait on the weekends though.

name: Jamar Wright
text: Great Experience Every Time. I only order toppers now. The pizza has been delicious and they have great toppings choices.

name: Bach Zeng
text: I've ordered twice from this place. The pizza ain't bad especially the buffalo chicken but both times I've had the same driver who was just rude and unwelcoming.  The last time I ordered cinnamon sticks and it looked like someone dropped the box upside down  and didn't care. It was fine to eat but it came in a horrible presentation.

name: Stacy Bieberich
text: The first experience we had went well. Pizza was about Papa John level, nothing too exciting. However, tonight we have been on the phone for 24 minutes without anyone answering even! I tend to be calmer than my husband, we were driving so â€¦More

name: Matt Madden
text: Toppers is the best! I live in deep Noblesville and will drive to get the Tottza from them. And The assistant GM Ariana is the prime example for customer service! It shows thay she truly cares and loves what she does. Lifelong repeat â€¦More

name: Coco Cayne
text: This rating is NOT for ALL toppers, just this location. They are rude, extremely rude. They give you old pizza that's been sitting around instead of what you ordered. My order was ready before I got there and they said it wasn't in the oven â€¦More

name: Richard Mcguire
text: The mac and cheese pizza was well worth trying, it tasted delicious

name: Dianna Williams
text: My order is already 40 minutes late I will not be calling again. I'm from out of town and this is the second time we have order from this place and the last time also was late. NO MORE.

name: Daniel Gallo
text: Better than the competitor nearby.  They are good and fast.

name: Breanne Davis
text: Best pizza in Indy, hands down. Also great service :)

name: Mikey Wheeler
text: First time my family had this pizza and everyone seemed to enjoy it.

name: Tara Alvey
text: Quick and friendly service! Clean environment. Awesome food!!!!

name: Doug Bromm
text: They don't answer their phone. Couldn't pick up until 15 minutes after they said it would be ready. Staff completely disorganized. Water dripping from roof onto floor is ignored.

name: Tehsninja
text: I love their Mac n cheese pizza, so delish!

name: Sam B.
text: They flat out lied to us.  First they send us the wrong pizza.  Things happen, so not the end of the world.  We called back and the said they would send a new one out right away, but they never showed up.   Horrible customer service.

name: Bryan L. Cook
text: They refused to deliver 3.8 miles from their store to the geist area! What in the heck are you idiots thinking????!!!! Get a grip. This is bad business and the guy on the phone was in on duty manager too. What a simpleton.

name: Michael Edwards
text: Been the a few times and the food is consistently good

name: Jason Alderson
text: Starting out pizza place in a established area..good Job! There's something here for everyone.

name: Tanya Lovell
text: We called in and it took 10mins for someone to get on the phone and then when our pizza was delivered it was BURNT to a crisp! This is our 2nd time ordering and both times were bad experiences! Will not be ordering from this place again.

name: James Craig
text: The food is great and the people are better!!

name: Cheyenne Thorpe
text: Killing it every day! XoxoxoX

name: Dane Love
text: Got the zaa brahhh

name: Chris Knuteson
text: Poor quality food for the value.

name: Rahmel Freeman
text: Great food and selection!

name: Anna Marie Golday Storer
text: Food was the worst I've had in a long time...

name: arripandaa chan
text: Love it!!!!

name: Matthew Green
text: I haven't found a Toppers that I dislike.

name: Michael Gravely
text: Yum 1230am pizza

name: kingkong king
text: Worse pizza ever, crazy delivery man.
